description: Nottingham Forest: Ask your pre-season questions to BBC Sport
title: Nottingham Forest: Ask your pre-season questions to BBC Sport
title_page: Nottingham Forest: Ask your pre-season questions to BBC Sport - BBC Sport
maintext:
The 2023-24 Premier League season is edging ever nearer, so what shape are Forest in before the big kick-off on Saturday, 12 August?
Our BBC Radio Nottingham expert Colin Fray is on hand to give his thoughts about all the goings-on at the City Ground if you send us your questions.
